column2: After a successful rebellion at Thorn, Heita-Meen, an ex-slave of House Dres, and her followers advanced on Stormhold. Now, with control over Thorn, Stormhold and the Tribe of Sarpa, it is time to follow your vision given by the Hist and take up arms in defense of the Dunmer against the Kamal Invasion.
The Hist shall guide my way. To Morrowind!
No mystical force controls my destiny.
